idea-plugin.name: Atom One Theme
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.3.1

  • Minor update to plugin metadata

1.3

  • Updated text foreground to softer white from official theme

1.2

  • Fixed selection foreground color

1.1

  • Fixed counter foreground color

1.0

  • Fixed application border color in Linux
  • Fixed suggestion hint selected line color
idea-plugin.description:
The Atom One theme, adapted for JetBrains by Subtheme. Both dark and light themes are included.

Search for Subtheme to find more themes, including Monokai Pro, Solarized, and Foundation.

Contributions are welcome with GitHub. Screenshots taken with Atom Material Icons and Operator Mono.
